DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Subjects friends VEB investigator collaborator , hospital office worker , repeat volunteer blood donor , etc . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Must minor , prisoner , pregnant woman incapable provide informed consent .
